pullRequest.title: [doc] Add github issue templates
pullRequest.bodyText:
Refs #2249
Note: this sets "blank_issues_enabled: false", so that one is forced to select a template.

nodes.bodyText:
I'm not sure what this means. Is this listing a template, that users should modify? Is the mvn command referring to building a user project, or pmd itself?
Maybe we should encourage users to provide a MWE
nodes.diffHunk:

commit.message: [doc] Update issue template for bug reports and rule violations
